dcterms:creator: Nikita Nangia
Samuel R. Bowman
dcterms:description: The ListOps dataset was introduced to evaluate the capacity of neural networks to build parse trees of nested formulas. The original dataset consists of formulas composed of operations on lists of integers, including minimum, maximum, median and sum modulo 10 of a list of integers.
dcterms:title: ListOps

dcterms:creator: Guillaume Lample
Fran√ßois Charton
dcterms:description: The Arithmetic dataset consists of formulas composed by sum, subtraction and multiplication operations between two integers sampled in the interval [-99, 99]. The dataset is designed to evaluate the model's ability to generalize to numbers with more digits than those seen during training.
dcterms:title: Arithmetic

dcterms:creator: Vishesh Agarwal
Somak Aditya
Navin Goyal
dcterms:description: The Algebra dataset consists of a subset of algebraic formulas which can always be reduced up to a minimal form in a deterministic way. Such formulas involve sum and subtractions between two monomials, and their final value is always a monomial.
dcterms:title: Algebra
